Own Choice from a Specified List
Wombwell, Yorkshire Promoted by Wombwell Main Barnsley Brass Band Choice of test piece: "Echoes of the Ocean", "Songs of Scotland" or "Belisario" Prizes: £7, £5, £2 10s, £1 March: 1. Old Silkstone, 2nd Wharncliffe, 3rd Chapeltown.
Aug. 15, 2013, 8:23 p.m. June 25, 2018, 9:19 a.m.
